column4: can't seem to boot ubuntu from the 7.10 desktop cd.  It says Ubuntu is intalled when I boot Windows.
Where else can I get some help on my initial installation?
I have the cd in the CD drive.  I boot the copmputer, but it doesn't boot from the cd.  Evidently I don't have the boot track copied properly.
Or your BIOS isnt setup to boot to CD first
